sentences.en: Agues come on horseback , but go away on foot.
sentences.cn: 病来如山倒,病去如抽丝.

sentences.en: Andrew traversed the prairie on horseback.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁骑马穿越大草原.

sentences.en: Are the two men on horseback chasing the thief?
sentences.cn: 马背上的两个男人是在追小偷 吗 ?

sentences.en: Few people travel on horseback now.
sentences.cn: 现在很少人骑马出门了.

sentences.en: In remote mountain areas, voters arrived on horseback.
sentences.cn: 在偏远山区，选民骑着马赶来了。

sentences.en: Joanna knew well how to ride horseback.
Knights used to tilt on horseback.
sentences.cn: 武士们以前在马背上以矛刺击.

sentences.en: Many people in this area ride horseback.
sentences.cn: 这个地区有很多人骑马。

sentences.en: Mary has always been a tomboy. She likes hiking and horseback riding.
sentences.cn: 玛丽一直很男子气, 她喜欢远足和骑马.

sentences.en: Police on horseback tried to ride the criminal down.
sentences.cn: 骑警奋力追赶那名罪犯.

sentences.en: She loved to ride; on horseback, she was reckless and utterly without fear.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢骑马；在马背上，她纵横驰骋，毫无畏惧。

sentences.en: The crowds were dispersed by policemen on horseback.
sentences.cn: 人群被骑着马的警察所驱散.

sentences.en: The knights tilted at each other on horseback.
sentences.cn: 骑士们骑马持矛相互冲刺.

sentences.en: There were two soldiers on horseback.
Two men on horseback - nothing else!
sentences.cn: 两个人骑在马上 ― ―没别的了.

words.tran_cn: 性急的；草率的；未经充分考虑的

trans.tran_en: If you do something on horseback, you do it while riding a horse
